issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
Is there a way to improve ListView creation with, for example, a template cache?
I manage to make an "alloy side" template cache that improve by 10% the ListView creation. But on IOS the ListView take long time for layout.
My use case is a ListView with 14 templates and more than 250 view to generate.
Thank you

comments.body:
Hello, 

Can you please provide examples of the feature handled in native platform. It would be helpful to understand provide support if is possible in native platform.

Regards,
Sharif
I'm not sure what you are waiting from me... What do you want me to provide to you?

Hello, 

You are wanting something for listview to create a large number of templates and views in shorter time then it usually take for Appcelerator to do so. Is there some way this is possible in native platform or some method or processes by which native code handles this. I am asking for some example of that. Also, Please explain your features a little bit. 

Regards,
Sharif.
I have no idea about the native development so I can't answer your question
